mapper.select: SELECT mv.MODEL_ID, mv.MODEL_VIEW_NAME, mv.TRAIN_CNT, mv.TRAIN_DATA_FILE, 1-md.MAPE AS ACCURACY FROM MODEL_VIEW mv INNER JOIN MODEL_DETAIL md ON mv.MODEL_ID = md.MODEL_ID WHERE md.MODEL_STATE = 'A' AND md.MODEL_TYPES = 'regression'
SELECT DETAIL_ID, MODEL_ID, MSE, RMSE, 1-MAPE AS MAPE, R2 FROM MODEL_DETAIL WHERE MODEL_ID = #{modelId} ORDER BY DETAIL_ID
